title: Lag general y sin derrota evitada.
body:
Lag general en una partida , y sin derrota evitada , ocurrio apartir del min 10 , esto provoco insultos y 0 ganas de seguir jugando.
Arreglen esto y en vez de eliminar quejas solo porque estan en mayuscula , respondan.

replies.body: Y quien va a habilitar la derrota evitada si ni tenemos rioters xdd

> [{quoted}](name=ZperKS,realm=LAS,application-id=v7qsfXsE,discussion-id=56au1dAX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-04T23:50:46.335+0000)
>
> como que no tenemos rioters?

ay amigazo, te invito a conocer lo que es la ironía

1 year ago we had dozens of community and behavior rioters: condor, excalibeer, gaussrik, etc. However, all our rioters were fired and consequently LAS is now in charge of "player support", more specifically in charge of "Achungo" (he has confirmed being the person in charge of support) [5] , the lack of rioters is a frequent issue of complaint in the forums, there is a widespread feeling that we as a region do not matter, that nobody listens to us and nobody represents us, we literally call ourselves "the abandoned server" 
no tenemos literalmente rioters
Nostros tambien tuvimos 300 de ping todo el equipo pero el equipo enemigo no y les ganamos igual xDDD
